channel.title: Office Complex Remake
channel.description:
Ho there, I made a small remake of Office Complex in hammer editor, mind you this is an old video, ive gotten much better since then. I named it Black Mesa Source Alpha 9 as a joke/prank and suprisingly some people on youtube believed it, which i take as a complement even though i dont think its very good. Just wanted to show you guys so here it is.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uq4HBQISasc[/url]

item.title: Office Complex Remake
item.dc:creator: Dredile
item.description:
λdam:

Like rot asked, is there a download? :3

Its only about 1 or two hallways so its really short, one of these days i might finish it up and upload it. But by then Black Mesa will be released and it will look like a joke compared to it.

I dunno we’ll see.

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Remake
item.dc:creator: Dredile
item.description:
Medevilae:

The new version has HDR and bumpmaps and everything is made out of displacements. :awesome:

Yeah that was taken back when we were still using the ep1 engine, i left before they really got serious, the mod wasn’t even on moddb when i was on the team.

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Remake
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Dredile:

Oh no dont worry about that, its scrapped, i made that back in 08 to 09 and they aren’t using it anymore, they dont really care about it actually

The new version has HDR and bumpmaps and everything is made out of displacements. :awesome:

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Remake
item.dc:creator: Dredile
item.description:
Medevilae:

Not shabby, not great. It’s pretty nice for using HL2 textures and like. However, I would have recommended the red skin for the doors.

Yeah it is older work, I can say ive gotten better, i do things like this now.

https://img87.imageshack.us/i/bapower10016qr8.jpg/

Yes that is a shot from Guard Duty, i used to work for them, and this was the alpha version, im not going to show you guys the full version of it for devious purposes ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Remake
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Dredile:

Ho there, I made a small remake of Office Complex in hammer editor, mind you this is an old video, ive gotten much better since then. I named it Black Mesa Source Alpha 9 as a joke/prank and suprisingly some people on youtube believed it, which i take as a complement even though i dont think its very good.
Just wanted to show you guys so here it is.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uq4HBQISasc

Not shabby, not great. It’s pretty nice for using HL2 textures and like. However, I would have recommended the red skin for the doors.

Read full topic
